duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, improve, and implement technology to automate manufacturing processes and improve safety, quality, and productivity.
Ensure that the quality system and methods are implemented.
Verify that feasibility studies are performed, and possible solutions are evaluated regarding costs, deadlines, risks, and functional choice criteria.
Confirm that validations are obtained, in collaboration with related industry trades, after the phases of realization, installation, start-up, and equipment development.
Maintain current records for the processing of evolutions, nonconformities, and obsolescence requests in respect to regulations.
Demonstrate homologation, qualification, and industrial robustness of equipment.

education_certification.credential: Associate or bachelor’s degree in a related field of study (Electrical Engineering, Automation, Robotics, etc.)
